messages.createInfo: Custom list layouts can be used by relationship panels.
messages.fieldsIncompatible: Fields can't be on the layout together: {fields}.

tooltips.tabBreak: A separate tab for the panel and all following panels until the next tab-break.
tooltips.noLabel: Don't display a column label in the header.
tooltips.notSortable: Disables the ability to sort by the column.
tooltips.width: A column width in percentage. It's recommended to have one column with the not-set width, usually it's the *Name* field.
tooltips.widthPx: A column width in pixels. Takes effect only if the (%) value is not set. Makes the column width fixed.
tooltips.sticked: The panel will be sticked to the panel above. No gap between panels.
tooltips.hiddenPanel: Need to click 'show more' to see the panel.
tooltips.dynamicLogicVisible: If set, the panel will be hidden unless the condition is met.
tooltips.dynamicLogicStyled: A color will be applied if a specific condition is met . The color is defined by the *Style* parameter.
tooltips.link: If checked, then a field value will be displayed as a link pointing to the detail view of the record. Usually it is used for *Name* fields.
